name: Recipe: Sing Your Heart Out
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Sing Your Heart Out.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Dish Effects</color>
A little surprise from the Flower-Feather Clan.
Regenerates 1 HP to the selected character every 8s for <color=#37ffff>32 – 48s</color> and displays the logo of the Flower-Feather Clan. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
<color=#ffffff>Proficiency</color>
20
<color=#ffffff>Dishes</color>

customize.name: Sing Your Heart Out
customize.desc: A cool-flavored throat lozenge. Said to be the Flower-Feather Clan's secret weapon for soothing their throats and protecting their vocal cords — so eat one and go sing your heart out! Just make sure you don't go overboard, as too much sugar can leave your throat feeling hoarse.

customize.name: Delicious Sing Your Heart Out
customize.desc: A cool-flavored throat lozenge. These exquisitely crafted candies seem to send a wave of coolness down your throat, relieving hoarseness like bubbling springwater spilling forth and cleansing parched earth. Your voice is left sounding as clear as a newly-fledged hatchling, eager to spread its wings and fly up into the sky.

customize.name: Suspicious Sing Your Heart Out
customize.desc: A cool-flavored throat lozenge. Its icy taste rushes through your mouth, setting your teeth chattering involuntarily and nearly half-freezing your heart. Forget about singing your heart out — even just making yourself understood is now a challenge...

customize.name: Recipe: Sing Your Heart Out
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Sing Your Heart Out.

customize.name: Sing Your Heart Out
customize.desc: A cool-flavored throat lozenge. Said to be the Flower-Feather Clan's secret weapon for soothing their throats and protecting their vocal cords — so eat one and go sing your heart out! Just make sure you don't go overboard, as too much sugar can leave your throat feeling hoarse.

customize.name: Mint
customize.desc: A refreshingly cool ingredient. The cool, fresh flavor can cut through the heat of many dishes.

customize.name: Embercore Flower
customize.desc: A strange flower that can be found all over the plains and highlands. Mature buds will bloom after being hit.

customize.name: Sugar
customize.desc: A seasoning derived from Sweet Flowers. Has the power to give both energy and happiness.

customize.name: Jam
customize.desc: A gelatinous substance made from fruit and sugar. Even a little bit can easily wake up tired taste buds.
